post: February is your students runway: start small now, build steadily, submit by May 3. MyImpact Challenge is open to students 13-19, with a chance at $10,000. Share this with a student who wants to make an impact:  https://bit.ly/3fyGGr3  #MyImpactChallenge  #ProjectBasedLearning  #CivicEducation  #YouthLeadership

Twenty students. One national cohort. BRIs 2026 Student Fellows were nominated by educators and selected through essays on leadership and citizenship, then spend six months practicing dialogue, building projects, and meeting civic leaders. Tag a teacher who should nominate a future Fellow. Read the full article:  https://bit.ly/4qXYaQD  #CivicEducation  #LeadershipDevelopment  #Civics  #Education  #StudentLeadership

Applications for the 2026 National Civics Bee close Feb. 3. Students progress through rounds powered by BRI-authored questions and materials. Comment with BEE  if youre sharing this with a school community.  https://lnkd.in/esNd4QDK  #NationalCivicsBee  #CivicEducation  #StudentOpportunity  #YouthLeadership

Incredibly proud to see  #AZGYC represented among the 20 students selected nationwide for the 2026 Bill of Rights Institute Student Fellowship! 🎉 Analiese Alexanders dedication to serving her local City of Maricopa community and her efforts to elevate youth voices on statewide education panels highlight the commitment of our young leaders toward achieving the  #ArizonaPromise of an  #ArizonaForEveryone. We look forward to seeing her positive impact continue to shine at a national level through this six-month civic fellowship! Congratulations! 👏  https://lnkd.in/gQFfe_wk

The next Civic Star Challenge cycle closes in just 2 days. In ~2 minutes (no uploads), you can log a civics lesson for a chance at $300 classroom awards + student swag.  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #CivicEducation  #K12  #America250

Students dont just need a grade, they need a cause. MyImpact Challenge helps them turn real community work into a clear story of impact. What issue deserves attention in your community?  https://bit.ly/3fyGGr3  #MyImpactChallenge  #StudentVoice  #CivicEngagement  #YouthLeadership

Got one student who always says, Wait, prove it ? Debating Matters: Transatlantic turns that instinct into evidence-first argument, starting with the U. S. Virtual Qualifier. 🔗  https://bit.ly/4aWAHd8  #DebatingMatters  #DMTA  #CivicEducation  #Debate

10,000 pocket Constitutions for 100 Illinois classrooms. Huge thanks to Komori America Corporation and TEAM Concept Printing for making it happen. When local industry invests in civics, students benefit.  #CivicEducation  #Illinois

Most students can quote the Declaration. Fewer can explain why it reads like a legal brief. In this BRI Scholar Talk, Matthew Spalding, author The Making of the American Mind, breaks down the 5 self-evident truths + the grievances (the evidence). Watch:  https://bit.ly/3O4bCne What line do your students misunderstand most?  #CivicEducation  #America250

Teachers do civic work daily: questions, discussions, and difficult topics handled well. Our Civic Star Challenge exists to recognize that work and reward classrooms along the way. If you believe civic learning matters, share this with a department chair or teammate whod actually use it. 🔗  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #CivicEducation  #TeacherSupport  #America250
